Desc.entry: An afternoon Tea Dance with Grace and Arnold Precious. Everyone welcome whether a beginner or an experienced dancer, tuition given. Fun, good for your health and sociable. Session fee includes afternoon tea, no need to book, just turn up. St Mary's Church is a registered charity and company limited by guarantee no. 4317500.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (office times), 2nd Mon in the month 2-4pm (tea dance)
